means: Work Education Evaluation Project 工作教育评估工程
cry ： 普通用词。指因痛苦、悲哀或伤感等出声地哭。
weep ： 书面用词，指小哭或无声地哭，侧重流泪。

sentence.Network_en: In severe cases, the skin can crack and weep.
sentence.Network_cn: 在恶劣的条件下，皮肤可能会开裂并流脓。

sentence.Network_en: Wonderfully melodic and tuneful, his songs have made me weep.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的歌旋律优美、悦耳动听，让我潸然泪下。

sentence.Network_en: There are times when I sit down and have a good weep.
sentence.Network_cn: 有时候我会坐下来痛痛快快地哭一场。

example.ex: She wanted to laugh and weep all at once...
The weeping family hugged and comforted each other...
example.tran: 哭泣着的一家人相互拥抱并彼此安慰。

entry.def: If a wound weeps, liquid or blood comes from it because it is not healing properly.

example.ex: In severe cases, the skin can crack and weep.
example.tran: 在恶劣的条件下，皮肤可能会开裂并流脓。

example.ex: ...little blisters which develop into weeping sores.

means.word_mean: 1. shed tears because of sadness, rage, or pain;

sentences.sentence: "She cried bitterly when she heard the news of his death"
"The girl in the wheelchair wept with frustration when she could not get up the stairs"

auth_sentence.content: She sometimes had a quiet weep about his death.
auth_sentence.res_content: She sometimes had a quiet weep about his death.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She sometimes had a quiet weep about his death.

auth_sentence.content: Alas the heavy day! Why do you weep.
auth_sentence.res_content: Alas the heavy day! Why do you weep.

sentences.cn: 她为她的悲惨命运而哭泣。

sentences.en: We all wept in silence for the deceased.
sentences.cn: 我们都默默为死者哀悼。

jushi.english: She wept to see him in such a terrible state.
jushi.chinese: 看到他处于那样的惨境,她哭了。

jushi.english: She lost control of her feelings and began to weep.
jushi.chinese: 她控制不住自己的感情,开始哭了起来。
